entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: -26.4°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -28.0°C
Wind: NNE 59 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
